seniority_level.evidence: Data Architect title with leadership responsibilities, $140k-$170k compensation, and 'player-coach' role leading team indicates senior/staff level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Architect' with architectural design responsibilities across large MS environment

sub_specialty.evidence: Broad architectural role covering ETL, ERP integrations, AI applications, and reporting - no specific niche specialization mentioned

leadership_expectation.evidence: Explicitly described as 'player-coach' role leading small team with mentoring responsibilities and hands-on technical work

primary_cloud.evidence: Strong Microsoft ecosystem focus with MS Fabric for ETL, Power BI for reporting, and large MS environment mentioned

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned, pure Microsoft ecosystem throughout

processing_paradigm.evidence: MS Fabric used for ETL processes, no real-time streaming mentioned, traditional data warehouse patterns

orchestrator_category.evidence: MS Fabric mentioned for ETL processes, which is Microsoft's cloud-native orchestration platform

storage_layer.evidence: Large MS environment with thousands of tables and Power BI reporting suggests data warehouse architecture

remote_restriction.evidence: Explicitly states 'Remote, anywhere in the US' indicating fully distributed remote work

timezone_focus.evidence: US-only restriction implies Americas timezone focus, though no specific timezone requirements mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Remote position with 'anywhere in the US' indicates no relocation required

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting, standard practice is to explicitly state if available

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, and senior-level role typically requires work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: US-only remote position suggests work authorization requirement without specific citizenship mandate

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time exempt position with comprehensive benefits package indicates W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Medical, dental, vision, 401(k), and PTO mentioned - standard 5-benefit package without premium perks

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Player-coach role suggests growth opportunity but no specific career tracks or advancement paths mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly mentions mentoring a small team as core responsibility

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No specific promotion, advancement, or career progression paths mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or role changes within organization

career_tracks_available.evidence: Leadership role suggests management track, but no IC track or specialist paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Mix of 'must have' requirements with some flexibility ('at least two of' ERP systems), balanced approach

scope_definition.evidence: Focused Data Architect role with well-defined responsibilities, single clear role not multi-role hybrid

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Reasonable skill set for senior data architect level, $140k-$170k compensation appropriate for scope
